com.github.fge.largetext.load

Class TextDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.largetext.load.TextDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public final class TextDecoder
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Text file decoder

    This is the first core class of this package (the second is TextCache. Its role is to decode a text file chunk by chunk. The size of chunks to use is determined when you build your LargeTextFactory.

    LargeText will call upon this class to obtain a TextRange (or a list of them) containing the character at a given index (or the range of characters), by using the methods getRange(int) and getRanges(IntRange) respectively.

    These methods are blocking, but they do not throw InterruptedException; if an interruption occurs, these methods reset the thread interruption status and throw the appropriate RuntimeException (for instance, an IndexOutOfBoundsException if the requested offset exceeds the number of characters in the file).

    Implementation note: this class uses a single threaded ExecutorService to perform the decoding operation. Decoding is not done in parallel, and cannot be, since it is not guaranteeed that a byte mapping can be decoded exactly to a character sequence (for instance, using UTF-8, the end of the mapping may contain one byte only of a three-byte sequence).

    See Also:
    DecodingStatus

        public TextRange getRange(int charOffset)
        Return the appropriate text range containing the character at the given offset
        Parameters:
        charOffset - the offset
        Returns:
        the appropriate TextRange
        Throws:
        LargeTextException - method has been interrupted, or a decoding error has occurred
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - offset requested is out of range

      • getRanges

        public List<TextRange> getRanges(IntRange range)
        Return an ordered iterable of text ranges covering the requested range
        Parameters:
        range - the range
        Returns:
        the appropriate list of text ranges
        Throws:
        LargeTextException - method has been interrupted, or a decoding error has occurred
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - range is out of bounds for this decoder

      • getTotalChars

        public int getTotalChars()
        Return the total number of characters in this decoder

        This method sleeps until the decoding operation finishes (either successfully or with an error).

        Returns:
        the total number of characters
        Throws:
        LargeTextException - method has been interrupted, or a decoding error has occurred
        See Also:
        DecodingStatus.getTotalSize()
